explanation: [0-0] On a black background, the left side shows a picture of a man, while the right side shows a picture of a sheep running on grassland. The black background above displays the subtitle "FINAL INESPERADO" and three shocked emojis.

[0-7] On the right side of the screen, a sheep is running. The picture on the right side then switches to a red basin containing a whole raw sheep, followed by the sheep being roasted and served on the table to be eaten. On the left side of the screen, the man is smiling, then his expression changes to shock, and finally, he collapses and says a word.
